short_summary: EB144-240233 - D200 and D108 Tool Crib Mezzanines - Consulting Services - Design Phase
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) requires structural engineering consulting services to lead an assessment of mezzanine layout options for 7 total locations within buildings D200 and D108, to assess the slab capacity to support the mezzanines and produce concept designs for each of the 7 shops.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Project Title (English)**: Design of D200 and D108 Tool Crib Mezzanines — Consulting Services
**Project Title (French)**: Étape de conception des mezzanines de râteliers à outils dans le bâtiment D200 et D108 — Services de conseils

**Solicitation Details**

| Field Name | Value |

| Solicitation Number | WS4348680904 |
| Title (English) | Design of D200 and D108 Tool Crib Mezzanines — Consulting Services |

| Tender Status (French) | Expiré |

**Procurement Method and Evaluation Process**

This procurement is a competitive bidding process using the Request for Proposal (RFP) method.

The selection of the contractor will be based on the combination of Technical Merit and Price.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is being issued under the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**

For more information about this solicitation, please contact:

Grant Steward
Acting Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
